statements: UPDATE tax_credits_and_incentives SET tax_credit_amount = 5000 WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE tax_credits_and_incentives SET tax_credit_name = 'Research Credit', tax_credit_amount = 7500 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE tax_credits_info SET credit_description = 'Updated description 1' WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE tax_credits_info SET credit_name='Research and Development Tax Credit', eligibility_criteria='Companies engaged in research activities are eligible' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE incentives_info SET applicable_region='Europe' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE tax_credits SET name='Renewable Energy Tax Credit', amount=5000.00, start_date='2022-01-01', end_date='2022-12-31' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE incentives SET description='New incentive program for eco-friendly products', eligibility_criteria='Small businesses only', percentage=2.50 WHERE id=3;
UPDATE tax_credits SET amount = 500.75, start_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE tax_credits SET credit_amount = 5000.00 WHERE credit_id = 1;

UPDATE tax_credits SET credit_amount = 5000.00, tax_year = 2022 WHERE credit_id = 1;

UPDATE tax_credits SET tax_credit_description = 'Updated Description' WHERE tax_credit_id = 1;
UPDATE businesses SET headquarters_location = 'New York' WHERE business_id = 3;
